text: Simon Gegenheimer is a German cross-country mountain biker. He competes in the cross-country, cross-country eliminator, and cross-country marathon events. He won the German national championship in the cross-country eliminator in 2012, 2013, and 2016. In 2016 he won the silver medal in the cross-country eliminator at the world championships in Nové Město na Moravě, Czech Republic. ==References== Category:German male cyclists Category:Cross-country mountain bikers Category:Living people Category:1988 births Category:Sportspeople from Karlsruhe
title: Simon Gegenheimer
